column4: Hello :> Can anyone recommend a good mp3 player that will work in Ubuntu other than the iPod line? I used to love the iPod but now you have to jailbreak it just to get songs on :<
I have a sansa fuze, but really depends what features you need
depends if you mean the mp3 interface its fine, one possible downside is it has an sdcard slot (so I have 8+4Gig), but it sort of combines them into one, which some find messy
its nice to use though, I use it plugged into soundcard on pc, and use it to play music on pc (which goes into stereo)
